# SHError.Code.audioDiscontinuity

**Case**

The error code to indicate the use of noncontiguous audio to request a match.

## Declaration

```swift
case audioDiscontinuity
```

## Audio format errors

- **SHError.Code.invalidAudioFormat**: The error code to indicate an unsupported audio format.

items.description: The error code to indicate an unsupported audio format.
items.name: SHError.Code.invalidAudioFormat
